name: intelligent-study-session-guardian-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Intelligent Study Session Guardian with automated testing

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
